	External calls:
	- tokenSaleContract.claim(_buyer,pendingTokenUser[_buyer]) (RC.sol#319)
	- tokenSaleContract.wallet().transfer(etherUser[_buyer]) (RC.sol#323)
	External calls sending eth:
	- tokenSaleContract.wallet().transfer(etherUser[_buyer]) (RC.sol#323)

	- RC.refundEther(address) (RC.sol#345-349)
	- RC.takeEther(address) (RC.sol#283-312)
	- RC.userBalance(address) (RC.sol#355-357)

		- advisor.transfer(advisorAmount) (RC.sol#441)
		- wallet.transfer(walletAmount) (RC.sol#442)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Buy(_buyer,tokenAmount,_ambassador) (RC.sol#433)
